arts.ttl: Roma Suffer Huge Injury Blow During UEL Clash Against Bilbao
arts.sum: Roma failed to beat Athletic Bilbao in their UEFA Europa League opener, but Paulo Dybala's withdrawal at halftime overshadowed the result. The Argentine forward had to come off at the break after feeling stiffness in his flexor muscle during the first half. The post Roma Suffer Huge Injury Blow During UEL Clash Against Bilbao appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: New Roma Boss Stays Upbeat Despite Europa League Setback Against Athletic
arts.sum: Ivan Juric remains 'positive' despite failing to win on his UEFA Europa League debut with Roma on Thursday night. The Giallorossi squandered a narrow halftime lead in a hard-fought 1-1 home draw against Athletic Bilbao. The post New Roma Boss Stays Upbeat Despite Europa League Setback Against Athletic appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Roma Player Ratings vs Athletic Bilbao: Dovbyk Lethal yet Insufficient
arts.sum: Roma stuttered at the beginning of their third consecutive UEFA Europa League campaign, throwing away a halftime lead in a 1-1 home draw against Athletic Bilbao. In a game of few scoring chances at the Stadio Olimpico, the Giallorossi paid the price for Ivan Juric's overly conservative approach after his team went 1-0 up. The post Roma Player Ratings vs Athletic Bilbao: Dovbyk Lethal yet Insufficient appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Former Juventus and Roma midfielder Miralem Pjanic joins CSKA Moscow
arts.sum: Former Juventus and Roma midfielder Miralem Pjanic has embarked on a new adventure in Russian football, signing with CSKA Moscow until June 30, 2025. The 33-year-old Bosnian international, who had been a free agent following his stint with FC Sharjah in the UAE, has chosen to continue his career in the Russian Premier League. Pjanic’s move to CSKA Moscow comes after speculation linking him with a return to Italian football, particularly with Genoa, who were reportedly interested in the midfielder following Malinovskyi’s serious injury in Venice.
